400.description: Validation errors or email sending failed

post.description: Creates a new flight record. Only Admin or Moderator roles are allowed.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of flights.
Search for flights with available seats using optional filters.

put.description: Updates an existing flight record by ID with optimistic locking.

delete.description: Deletes a flight record by ID.

post.description: Creates a new booking for the authenticated user. Requires flight details, seat selections, payment provider, and an idempotency key to prevent duplicates. Sends an email notification upon success.

get.description: Retrieves the status of a booking by its ID.

post.description: Confirms a booking for the authenticated user by its ID. Sends a confirmation email upon success.
Receives and processes Stripe webhook events. Rate-limited to 10 requests per minute.

parameters.name: stripe-signature
parameters.description: Stripe signature for verifying the webhook event

requestBody.description: Raw webhook event data from Stripe (typically a JSON buffer)

post.description: Confirms a payment using the payment intent ID and updates the associated booking status.

400.description: Invalid payment intent or amount mismatch

post.description: Retries a payment for a booking that previously failed.

400.description: Booking not in a retryable state

info.title: Smart Airport API
info.description: API documentation for the Smart Airport application

email.description: Email of the user to resend verification

refreshToken.description: Refresh token to obtain a new access token

email.description: Email of the user to request password reset

price.description: Price of the seat in currency units

idempotencyKey.description: Unique key to prevent duplicate bookings

expectedAmount.description: Expected amount in cents for payment confirmation
